name: Super Sciurus World
description: Super Sciurus World Demo. Go through the first three levels of this platform game. Memories of Mario style gaming can be spotted in every corner of the game. Funny creatures are trying to stop Super Sciurus from helping Pretty Princess to regain her freedom. Super Sciurus throws spinning peanuts in order to defend itself. Big Enemy Bosses are there too to stop Super Sciurus. The Pretty Princess is magically kept away from her freedom and Super sciurus goal is to aid the pretty princess to get her freedom back and make him the master of Her Royal Guards.
